summary: 2 High Quality Shields with 2 Swords Roman Style
descriptionHtml:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1R0rU5y.jpg[/IMG]
This Mod is the Final Version of my [COLOR=#548DD4][SIZE=2]Roman Centurion Set [/SIZE][/COLOR]which was Inspired by Ryse Son of Rome. Again this Mod will bring you High Quality Textures in 2k - 2048x2048 Resolution.
[COLOR=#548DD4][SIZE=3]It contains:
2 Shields and 2 One Handed Swords.[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WRJqlIK.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cmEG6Zw.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tRzAEkE.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks for this Great Video Nozi !!!
[youtube]qG-r6a499GM[/youtube][youtube]yA2_kwukATE[/youtube]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/f2FHeQQ.jpg[/IMG]

Everything can be crafted under the Iron Section at any Forge if you bring the right Materials.
Every Part can also be Improved at the Workbench or Sharpening Wheel if you have the required Materials.

Future Plans are to Release some different Texture Variations and Improvements.
Feel free to Upload some Screenshots if you like and leave some Comment.

For now I hope you Enjoy this Set.

Here is a Short Video of the Previous Old Version.

[youtube]k0mcOYtdQRE[/youtube]

[COLOR=#548DD4][SIZE=3]How to Install:[/SIZE][/COLOR]
Simply drop the Data Folder into your Skyrim Main Directory and Activate the ESP File in your Skyrim Launcher if it is not already checked.

[size=14][color=red][b]Please take a look at some of my Other Mods[/b][/color][/size]
[size=8]Please Click on the Images[/size]
